entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Resolute
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:32 AM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -36.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Resolute Airport 07:00 AM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -36.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -39.7°C
Wind: N 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Clear. Temperature falling to minus 38 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Clear. Blowing snow early this morning. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 40 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 38 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 57. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 30 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming east 20 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 30 by morning. Wind chill minus 53 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few clouds. Temperature falling to minus 37 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 37 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 50 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023
